statements: SELECT * FROM employee_retina_scanning_data;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employee_retina_scanning_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) FROM employee_retina_scanning_data;
SELECT employee_name FROM employee_retina_scanning_data WHERE access_level = 'A' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_retina_scanning_data WHERE retina_scan_data IS NOT NULL LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_name, access_level FROM employee_retina_scanning_data WHERE employee_id = 100
SELECT * FROM employee_retina_scanning_data WHERE access_level = 'A'
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_retina_scanning_data ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT * FROM employee_retina_scanning_data WHERE employee_id > 50 AND access_level = 'B'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employee_retina_scanning_data
SELECT * FROM employee_retina_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, retina_scan_data FROM employee_retina_data ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, access_time FROM access_log WHERE access_result = 'success';
SELECT access_time, access_result FROM access_log WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT log_id, access_time, access_result FROM access_log WHERE access_time >= '2022-01-01' AND access_time < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_retina_data WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT employee_id, retina_scan_data FROM employee_retina_data ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_accesses FROM access_log GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_accesses > 10;
SELECT MAX(access_time) AS last_access_time FROM access_log WHERE employee_id = 456;
SELECT employee_id, access_result FROM access_log WHERE access_result = 'Approved' ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeRetinaScanning;
SELECT employee_id, scan_date FROM EmployeeRetinaScanning WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM AccessControlLogs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, access_time, access_granted FROM AccessControlLogs WHERE access_granted = TRUE;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.clearance_level, a.access_time FROM SecurityClearance e JOIN AccessControlLogs a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM SecurityClearance WHERE clearance_level = 'Top Secret';
SELECT employee_id, scan_date FROM EmployeeRetinaScanning ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, access_time FROM AccessControlLogs WHERE access_granted = TRUE ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, clearance_level FROM SecurityClearance WHERE clearance_level LIKE '%Secret%' ORDER BY employee_id;

SELECT e.employee_id, s.clearance_level, a.access_time FROM SecurityClearance s JOIN EmployeeRetinaScanning e ON s.employee_id = e.employee_id JOIN AccessControlLogs a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employee ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Department WHERE department_name = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM Employee WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employee ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, retina_scan_data FROM Employee WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT department_id, department_name FROM Department WHERE department_name LIKE '%IT%';

SELECT AccessLog.log_id, AccessLog.access_time, Employee.first_name, Employee.last_name FROM AccessLog JOIN Employee ON AccessLog.employee_id = Employee.employee_id ORDER BY AccessLog.access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeInformation;
SELECT full_name, department FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT position, full_name FROM EmployeeInformation ORDER BY position DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccessControl WHERE access_date >= '2021-06-01';
SELECT full_name, clearance_level FROM EmployeeInformation JOIN SecurityClearance ON EmployeeInformation.employee_id = SecurityClearance.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeInformation ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, department, position FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department, access_location, access_date FROM EmployeeInformation INNER JOIN AccessControl ON EmployeeInformation.employee_id = AccessControl.employee_id;

SELECT e.full_name, d.department_name, s.clearance_level FROM EmployeeInformation e LEFT JOIN Department d ON e.department = d.department_name LEFT JOIN SecurityClearance s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;

SELECT e.full_name, r.scan_timestamp, r.scan_result FROM EmployeeInformation e INNER JOIN RetinaScanningLogs r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id WHERE r.scan_result = 'Approved' ORDER BY r.scan_timestamp DESC;
